## **Tender Description**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) intends to retain a Contractor to provide construction services for the construction of a 18074mm x 7234mm modular building in Ottawa, Ontario. Bidders are responsible for obtaining copies of bid forms, special instructions, and amendments issued prior to bid closing, and must ensure they are addressed in the submitted bid. Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### **Additional Requirements**

* All documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Bidders must have a business profile in the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) to compete for federal government contracts that are set-aside for Indigenous businesses through the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.
* Canada will not be held responsible for any information found on websites of third parties. Any changes to the tender will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) and it is the sole responsibility of the Bidder to regularly consult GETS for the most up-to-date information.
